Summary: Round cicrle/sphere. Bright like a star
divs: Sighting DetailsThere was a meteor shower that night so I decided to have a fire in my backyard. I have already seen a couple of meteors when I saw three lights in a triangle formation. Immedietly after thinking it was just a plane all three lights broke apart in different directions. They did not travel far from each other and after just a few seconds they came back together but this time in single line formation. They then did slow, round circle manouvers for the duration of about a minute when suddenly they came to a complete stop in the sky. After hovering there for a couple of seconds they then sped away at a faster speed until they were out of sight. During this time of sighting I felt much excitment and a little shock of actually seeing a UFO. I was quite excited about the event for some time after it as well.
